title: Week In Politics: New Restraints On Government Surveillance
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with regular political commentators David Brooks of The New York Times and E.J. Dionne of the Washington Post and Brookings Institution about new restraints on government surveillance and the status of the 2016 presidential race.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
